description: This add-on allows you to save, edit and remove links to frequently visited pages. Shortcut Windows+Alt+K.

translations.description: This add-on allows you to save, edit and remove links to frequently visited pages. Shortcut Windows+Alt+K.
Esse complemento permite que você salve, edite e remova links de páginas visitadas com frequência. Atalho Windows+Alt+K.
Este complemento permite-lhe guardar, editar e remover ligações a páginas frequentemente visitadas. Atalho Windows+Alt+K.
This add-on allows you to save, edit and remove links to frequently visited pages. Shortcut Windows+Alt+K.
